data.eml:eml: Meharia ganslmeieri sp. nov. — a new Cossidae species from Zambia (Lepidoptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yakovlev, Roman V., Witt, Thomas J. (2015): Meharia ganslmeieri sp. nov. — a new Cossidae species from Zambia (Lepidoptera). Zootaxa 4032 (3): 319-321, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4032.3.7
